name: queryMssqlDb
description: Returns a list of summary information for Microsoft SQL databases.

availability_group_id.description: Filter by the `id` of an Always On Availability Group.

name.description: Filter by a substring of the database name.

limit.description: Limit the number of matches returned.

offset.description: An integer that specifies a number of initial matches to ignore.

is_relic.description: Filter database summary information by the value of the `isRelic` field.

is_live_mount.description: Filter database summary information by the value of the `isLiveMount` field.

is_log_shipping_secondary.description: Filter database summary information by the value of the `isLogShippingSecondary` field.

sort_by.description: Specifies the SQL Server Database attribute to use in sorting the summary information. Performs an ASCII sort using the specified attribute, in the order specified by sort_order.

sort_order.description: Sort order, either ascending or descending.

include_backup_task_info.description: Include backup task information in response.
